constituent: confused, metal, gold, once upon a time, storyteller, salad, sun, day
koohiiStory1: A long time ago, people of the world got confused because there were so many kinds of Metal coins. today we only have the euro.
koohiiStory2: Once upon a time, it was thought that the ancient "art" of alchemy could transform anything into gold. At that time, people were obviously confused about the difference between reality and myth. (Arguably people are still as confused as ever, just about different things now.).
words:
錯誤(さくご): mistake
錯覚(さっかく): optical illusion, hallucination
